name: NewsWhip Media Ltd.
description: Developer of a content analytics platform designed to transform data from stories, videos, and social posts into actionable insights. The company's platform uses a proprietary technology to track all the news published by sources and gathers the social data generated by each to show users what is spreading fast and what is overperforming, enabling media and marketing businesses to leave an impact on audiences with their stories and posts.
one_liner: Developer of a content analytics platform designed to transform data from stories, videos, and social posts into actionable insights. The company's platform uses a proprietary technology to track all the news published by sources and gathers the social data generated by each to show users what is spreading fast and what is overperforming, enabling media and marketing businesses to leave an impact on audiences with their stories and posts.
